article_title: Attorneys Who Sued Toyota Will Represent GM Plaintiffs
article_text:
Three attorneys who sued Toyota Motor Corp. over unintended acceleration will represent dozens of people suing General Motors Co. over economic losses tied to the auto maker's recall of the Chevrolet Cobalt and other older models for a defective ignition switch.

Attorneys Steve Berman, Elizabeth Cabraser and Mark Robinson Jr. have been assigned as temporarily lead counsel representing the plaintiffs. They have until July 7 to confer...
